meanings.definition: A person or thing that fabricates or manufactures something.
meanings.sent1: The fabricants in the factory work hard to create new products.
meanings.sent2: The fabricants produced a large number of toys for the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The fabricants decided to have a race to see who could make the most items in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The fabricants of dreams wove together a tapestry of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The fabricants hummed as they crafted each piece with care.

meanings.definition: A manufactured product, especially in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: The store received a shipment of fabricants to stock their shelves.
meanings.sent2: The fabricants on the assembly line moved swiftly to meet the demand.
meanings.sent3: The fabricants gleamed under the bright lights of the showroom.
meanings.sent4: The fabricants filled the warehouse with their neatly stacked boxes.
meanings.sent5: The fabricants were packaged and ready to be shipped worldwide.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals created artificially for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The scientist's experiment resulted in fabricants with unique abilities.
meanings.sent2: The fabricants in the virtual world were designed for a special mission.
meanings.sent3: The fabricants in the game formed a team to defeat the final boss.
meanings.sent4: The fabricants of the future may revolutionize the workforce.
meanings.sent5: The fabricants stood ready for their programmed tasks.
